games.desc: I built the Brute Force Password Cracker as a fun program to test out passwords, and to test my knowledge of Python 3 and its libraries

games.desc: One of my older projects. Used the Three.js library. 100% made by me! How to play: Click or touch the screen to start
games.author: JSer

games.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
games.desc: As a fun side project, I built this awesome Tic-Tac-Toe game (with three AI levels) in May 2017
games.author: CyanCoding

games.desc: Hunt the golden ball and avoid the dangerous obstacles that can damage your score!
games.author: dosmaster4life

games.name: the-fishing-game
games.title: The Fishing Game
games.desc: Explore your way through the different regions by catching the rarest fish you can. Catch em all to fill up your fishedex!
games.author: AmeliaBlackwell

games.name: kars
games.title: Kars
games.desc: A survival driving game. Use arrow keys to move, avoid the trees, and collect fuel!
games.author: ALVINWAN1

games.name: the-dark-forst
games.title: The Dark Forest
games.desc: You are lost in the forest and you are trying to get out of it and find your way back to civilization. (Hopefully) You will find a dog. Try to tame it
games.author: DJWang

games.name: minecraft-webgl-project-core
games.title: Minecraft WebGL Project Core
games.desc: This is the final version of my WebCraft and MC-Engine projects. I merged them into one, and added a menu

games.desc: It was for one of my school projects, but i still thought it was good
games.author: AidanMott

games.name: three-ways
games.title: Three Ways
games.desc: This is my three ways game. You can move the ball with k, l, and m or arrows. Press enter to play and retry. It's better to play in a new tab. I hope you will enjoy it
games.author: Equation

games.name: 3d-online-multiplayer-shooter
games.title: 3D Online Multiplayer Shooter
games.desc: Featured in the Repl.it Newsletter. Made with pure JS (Node.js for server-side). Used the Three.js and Socket.io libraries
games.author: JSer

games.name: krossy-road
games.title: Krossy Road
games.desc: This game was developed for educational purposes for Bit By Bit (http://littlebitbybit.org). Worldwide high scores aren't available yet, but based on my personal experience of watching other people play, the current record is 429. Have fun!
games.author: derekwan
